skills.name: agent-browser
skills.purpose: Browser automation using Vercel's agent-browser CLI
skills.useWhen: you need to interact with web pages, fill forms, take screenshots, or scrape data. Alternative to Playwright MCP - uses Bash commands with ref-based element selection. Triggers on "browse website", "fill form", "click button", "take screenshot", "scrape page", "web automation"

skills.purpose: reviewing architecture for agent-native workflows, risks, and verification needs

skills.purpose: Clarify requirements before implementing. Do not use automatically, only when invoked explicitly

skills.name: every-style-editor
skills.purpose: This skill
skills.useWhen: reviewing or editing copy to ensure adherence to Every's style guide. It provides a systematic line-by-line review process for grammar, punctuation, mechanics, and style guide compliance

skills.name: file-todos
skills.purpose: This skill
skills.useWhen: managing the file-based todo tracking system in the todos/ directory. It provides workflows for creating todos, managing status and dependencies, conducting triage, and integrating with slash commands and code review processes

skills.name: frontend-design
skills.purpose: Create distinctive, production-grade frontend interfaces with high design quality. Use this skill when the user asks to build web components, pages, or applications. Generates creative, polished code that avoids generic AI aesthetics

skills.name: gemini-imagegen
skills.purpose: This skill
skills.useWhen: generating and editing images using the Gemini API (Nano Banana Pro). It applies when creating images from text prompts, editing existing images, applying style transfers, generating logos with text, creating stickers, product mockups, or any image generation/manipulation task. Supports text-to-image, image editing, multi-turn refinement, and composition from multiple reference images

skills.name: markdown-converter
skills.purpose: Convert documents and files to Markdown using markitdown
skills.useWhen: converting PDF, Word (.docx), PowerPoint (.pptx), Excel (.xlsx, .xls), HTML, CSV, JSON, XML, images (with EXIF/OCR), audio (with transcription), ZIP archives, YouTube URLs, or EPubs to Markdown format for LLM processing or text analysis

skills.name: modular-skills-architect
skills.purpose: Map and refactor an agent context ecosystem: skills, commands/workflows, hooks, agent files, AGENTS.md templates, and docs. Output system map, module/dependency design, Register updates, and a concrete split/consolidate/rename/delete plan
skills.useWhen: inherited messy skills/commands/workflows/AGENTS/docs and nobody can explain fit; combining sources and need to consolidate + rationalise, keep it simple; skills overlap, routing surprises, outputs inconsistent, glue logic in wrong place; need concrete refactor plan (split/consolidate/rename/delete), not theory
outputs: dependency map (a -> b edges + mermaid diagram)

skills.name: multi-agent-routing
skills.purpose: Route multi-agent work: choose sub-agents if supported, else parallel/serial sessions
skills.useWhen: splitting tasks across multiple agents and client capability varies
outputs: Routing plan (sub-agents vs sessions; parallel vs serial).

skills.name: nano-banana-pro
skills.purpose: Generate/edit images with Nano Banana Pro (Gemini 3 Pro Image). Use for image create/modify requests incl. edits. Supports text-to-image + image-to-image; 1K/2K/4K; use --input-image
outputs: Saves PNG to current directory (or specified path if filename includes directory)
Script outputs the full path to the generated image
**Do not read the image back** - just inform the user of the saved path

skills.name: openai-image-gen
skills.purpose: Batch-generate images via OpenAI Images API. Random prompt sampler + `index.html` gallery
